summary: REQ-1 appears implemented via a new App Status & Live Link section in the Admin Settings dialog with runtime-derived URL and copy-to-clipboard toast. Evidence for REQ-2 (backend public diagnostics query returning canister principal + version/timestamp and frontend hook wiring) and REQ-3 (Going Live Checklist panel) is not present in the provided diff excerpts, so they cannot be verified as implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Expose a backend query that returns deployment diagnostics (at minimum: backend canister principal and a backend-reported timestamp/version string), and surface it in the “App Status / Live Link” section with non-blocking error handling.
missing_requirements.reason: The frontend section references `useGetBackendDiagnostics()` and renders version/timestamp, but the diff excerpt does not show the hook implementation nor any backend `public query` method that returns canister principal + a backend-generated string/timestamp. With the provided truncated evidence, the required backend API and the actor/react-query wiring cannot be confirmed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a short, English “Going Live Checklist” panel in the “App Status / Live Link” section (incognito/private verification + diagnostics should load note; no builder UI references).
missing_requirements.reason: The provided AppStatusLiveLinkSection excerpt shows Live URL and Backend Diagnostics UI, but no checklist panel text is visible in the truncated content, so this requirement cannot be verified as implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an "Open" button/link that opens the current app URL in a new tab.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 only asks for displaying the URL and providing a one-click "Copy link" action with a success toast; opening the link in a new tab was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a backend state migration and a persistent `backendVersion` field initialized to "1.0.0".
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 requires a diagnostics query returning principal and a backend-generated display string; it does not explicitly require a schema migration or storing the version in stable state. This may be implementation detail, but it is not directly requested in the BuildRequest.
